alert.note: Alert for Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 5:32PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Las Animas County through 600 PM MDT... At 532 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Model, or 17 miles northeast of Trinidad, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Model. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft
